Posts.EditableText:
Not gonna lie, I'm a bit of an idiot when it comes to this stuff! For about 6 months now I have been searching for an engine that works for me, that I can actually use for Text-based Games. I wish to create a sort of visual novel that spans across a large world with 5 seperate characters to play as.

Do people have Health and they die when it hits 0? Do they just have a binary 'Alive/Dead' boolean that switches from True to False (And maybe back again)?
